name: Is the lift main circuit breaker panel installed in accordance with current layout drawings
Is the lift main switch clearly identified with its unit number
Is the type and rating of main switch correct for the load and duty
Is circuit breaker earthing terminated by not less than 1/4" bolt and continuous
Is the builders main switch correctly identified as to source and designation of supply
Is the type and rating of builders main switch correct for load and duty
Are lift car light and power circuit breakers correctly rated and marked
Are circuit breaker lockouts fitted and operational with an appropriate label fitted
Is an emergency power source available to the lift main circuit breaker panel
Are "emergency power source" signs fitted clearly identifying location of supply
Has an emergency power simulation test been satisfactorily performed
Has earth continuity and insulation resistance been checked on all mains cables.
If checked please verify type of equipment used and Serial numbers.
Type of Equipment  -  Insulation KYORITSU     Serial No.  5024602
